org.scandroid.util

Interface ISCanDroidOptions

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLISCanDroidOptions, DefaultSCanDroidOptions

    public interface ISCanDroidOptions
    Author:
    acfoltzer

    An abstraction of the options for a SCanDroid execution
